titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale College Records of Classes
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday March 5, 2019 at 08:04

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, questionnaires, memoranda, log books, memorabilia, agendas, minutes and finanical reports from class council and executive council meetings, and statistical charts and reports of Yale College classes. Materials concerning the Sheffield Scientic School Class of 1920 are also included.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 10-A (YRG 10-A), Records of Yale College classes.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale College Records of Classes (RU 491). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, questionnaires, memoranda, log books, memorabilia, agendas, minutes and finanical reports from class council and executive council meetings, and statistical charts and reports of Yale College classes. Materials concerning the Sheffield Scientic School Class of 1920 are also included.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Sheffield Scientific School. Class of 1920

accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
